mapper.insert: insert into cart (account, goodsSpecsId, goodsId, number) values(#{account}, #{goodsSpecsId}, #{goodsId}, #{number})
mapper.select: select id, goodsSpecsId, goodsId, number, createdAt, updatedAt from cart where account = #{account} and goodsSpecsId = #{goodsSpecsId} and goodsId = #{goodsId};
mapper.update: update cart set number = #{number} where account = #{account} and goodsSpecsId = #{goodsSpecsId} and goodsId = #{goodsId};
